text: @parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump It is a bad look. Like Trump and Pence are gagging you which would be appropriate for Fauci to be wearing. Or advertising that the Coronavirus pandemic was brought to you by Trump and Pence. I think you want to lose.
